title: Blackjack
description: Let's play Blackjack! Get as close to 21 as possible without going over. Blackjack is a classic card game that tests both tactics and luck. Use your skills and intuition to win big!
objectiveText: The objective of the game is to have a hand value closer to 21 than the dealer's without going over 21.
rule1: Each player is dealt two cards.
rule2: The player may choose to 'hit' to receive additional cards to improve their hand value.
rule3: If the player's hand value goes over 21, the player busts and loses the game.
rule4: The player may choose to 'stand' to keep their current hand value. The dealer then reveals their cards and plays according to house rules.
cardRankingsText: Cards 2 through 10 have their face value, while Jacks, Queens, and Kings are worth 10. Aces can count as either 1 or 11.
noteText: If a player has a 10-point card and an Ace, it's called 'blackjack' and is the highest possible hand.
